description: Retrieves metadata for a Greengrass core device.

parameters.name: coreDeviceThingName
parameters.description: The name of the core device. This is also the name of the IoT thing.

nested_items.name: coreDeviceThingName
nested_items.description: The name of the core device. This is also the name of the IoT thing.

nested_items.name: coreVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the IoT Greengrass Core software that the core device runs. This version is equivalent to the version of the Greengrass nucleus component that runs on the core device. For more information, see the Greengrass nucleus component in the IoT Greengrass V2 Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The operating system platform that the core device runs.

nested_items.name: architecture
nested_items.description: The computer architecture of the core device.

nested_items.name: runtime
nested_items.description: The runtime for the core device. The runtime can be:

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the core device. The core device status can be:
HEALTHY --- The IoT Greengrass Core software and all components run on the core device without issue.
UNHEALTHY --- The IoT Greengrass Core software or a component is in a failed state on the core device.

nested_items.name: lastStatusUpdateTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the core device's status last updated, expressed in ISO 8601 format.
